question: Dugsiiye maxay qabataa?
answer: Dugsiiye waa madal waxbarasho online ah oo bixisa koorsooyin, mentorship iyo tababaro xirfadeed.

question: Dugsiiye ma bixisaa discount?
answer: Haa, Dugsiiye mararka qaar waxay bixisaa qiimo dhimis iyo fursado gaar ah.

question: Mentorship-ka Dugsiiye maxaa lagu bartaa?
answer: Mentorship-ka Dugsiiye waxaad ku baran kartaa xirfado la xiriira barnaamijinta, design, AI, iyo skills kale oo la taaban karo.

question: Maxay yihiin maadooyinka Dugsiiye bixiso?
answer: Dugsiiye waxay bixisaa maadooyin ay ka mid yihiin: Barnaamijinta (Programming), Naqshadeynta (Design), Sirdoonka Artificial (AI), Xirfadaha xirfadeed iyo xog uruurinta iyo falanqaynta.

question: Maxay yihiin casharrada muhiimka ah ee Dugsiiye?
answer: Casharrada muhiimka ah ee Dugsiiye waxaa ka mid ah: Hordhac Barnaamijinta Python, Naqshadeynta UI/UX, Hordhac AI iyo Machine Learning, Xirfadaha Warbixinta iyo Falanqaynta Xogta, iyo horumarinta xirfadaha shaqsiga.

question: Maxaad iigu talin lahayd si aan Dugsiiye uga faa'iidaysto?
answer: Waxaan kugula talinayaa: Joogtee jadwal waxbarasho maalinle ah, qoraal samee inta aad casharro baranayso, la xiriir mentors-ka marka aad wax fahmi weydo, samee ku celcelin badan, iyo ka faa'iidayso qiimo dhimista iyo webinars-ka Dugsiiye.

question: Maxaa muhiim u ah fahamka Dugsiiye?
answer: Dugsiiye waxay xooga saartaa xirfadaha suuqyada shaqada loo baahan yahay, waxayna bixisaa koorsooyin habaysan oo aad kula kulmi karto khabiiro kala duwan. Waxbarashada online-ka ah waxay kuu ogolaaneysaa inaad si dabacsan wax u barato.

question: Haddii aan Dugsiiye kusoo biiro oo juhdi badan sameeyo, fullstack developer ma noqon karaa?
answer: Haa, haddii aad si joogto ah u barato koorsooyinka Dugsiiye isla markaana dadaal badan sameyso, waad noqon kartaa Fullstack Developer xirfad leh.

question: Hadii cilad iga qabsato dhanka cashirka ama project-ka, ma heli karaa team i caawiya?
answer: Waad heli kartaa. Dugsiiye waxa uu leeyahay support team 24-saac diyaar ah oo kuu fududeynaya xalinta ciladaha casharrada iyo mashruucyada.

question: Waa maxay JavaScript (JS)?
answer: JavaScript waa luqad barnaamijineed oo aad ugu muhiimsan horumarinta websaydyada, taas oo kuu ogolaanaysa inaad website-ka ka dhigto mid firfircoon oo interactive ah.

question: Waa maxay React?
answer: React waa library ay sameysay Facebook oo kuu fududeyneysa in aad dhisto user interfaces (UI) casri ah, gaar ahaan dhinaca frontend-ka websaydyada.

question: Farqiga u dhexeeya JavaScript iyo React waa maxay?
answer: JavaScript waa luqadda aasaasiga ah ee barnaamijinta browser-ka, halka React uu yahay library ka dhisan JavaScript oo kuu sahlaaya in aad si fudud u maareyso UI-ga webkaaga.

question: Sidee ku bilaabi karaa barashada Fullstack?
answer: Waxaad ku bilaabi kartaa inaad barato HTML, CSS, JavaScript, kadib React ama Vue frontend-ka, markaas kadib Node.js iyo Database sida MongoDB backend-ka.

question: Dugsiiye ma bixisaa casharro ku saabsan frontend iyo backend?
answer: Haa, Dugsiiye waxay bixisaa casharro ku saabsan frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) iyo backend (Node.js, Databases) si aad u noqoto Fullstack Developer.

question: Sidee u ogaan karaa koorsada iga haboon ee Dugsiiye?
answer: Dugsiiye waxay bixisaa talooyin iyo hagitaan aad kaga faaâ€™iidaysan karto doorashada koorsada kugu haboon ee la jaanqaadaysa hadafkaaga xirfadeed.
